title: Effectiveness of Intelligent Tutoring Systems A Meta-Analytic Review
authors: JA Kulik, JD Fletcher - Review of Educational Research
excerpt: Abstract This review describes a meta-analysis of findings from 50 controlled evaluations of intelligent computer tutoring systems. The median effect of intelligent tutoring in the 50 evaluations was to raise test scores 0.66 standard deviations over conventional levels, or  ...

title: 国外自我解释的理论与应用研究及其对我国的启示
authors: 路海东， 景艳梅 - 外国教育研究
excerpt: 自我解释是在学习与问题解决过程中将学习材料解释给自己的学习活动. 作为有效的学习策略, 自我解释对学习产生促进作用. 尽管对自我解释的心理机制的研究观点仍未统一, 但自我解释的应用研究已经在问题解决, 阅读理解, 计算机智能辅导系统等许多领域展开. 国外 ...
